channel.title: [PI] Instant Switching Problem
channel.description:
I was looking at this tutorial: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/337499-pi-instant-switching.html
and I don't have a connectionhandler class, where would I put the public void messageReceived or where can I find it to replace it with Stuart's?
